parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the map elevation offset from [map]/config.cpp.

Returns 0 if there's no elevationOffset defined in the config of the current world.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''getElevationOffset'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - elevation offset of the map

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_offset = [[getElevationOffset]];</code>
</value></part></template>
